testcase.name: testDrop

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: The drop action immediately moves the current tetromino all the way down such that it collides with other blocks or the bottom of the board, and spawns a new tetromino. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII IIII | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .T.. | IIII TTT. | IIII
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII .T.. | IIII TTT. | IIII
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.. | IIII TTT. | IIII
step=3, rand=5, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII TTT. | IIII .... | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=4, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII .TT. | IIII .T.. | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=5, rand=5, actions=<Left> Want | Got ✗ ------------ T... | IIII TT.. | IIII T... | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=6, rand=0, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII IIII | IIII .... | IIII T..I | IIII TT.I | IIII TT.I | IIII
step=7, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII T.II | IIII TT.I | IIII TT.I | IIII
step=8, rand=5, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII TTT. | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII ..I. | IIII T.II | IIII
step=9, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII .TT. | IIII .T.. | IIII .... | IIII ..I. | IIII T.II | IIII
step=10, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII TTT. | IIII .T.. | IIII .... | IIII ..I. | IIII T.II | IIII
step=11, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII TT.. | IIII .T.. | IIII .... | IIII ..I. | IIII T.II | IIII
step=12, rand=0, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII IIII | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .T.. | IIII TTI. | IIII
step=13, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII .T.. | IIII TTI. | IIII
step=14, rand=0, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.. | IIII TTI. | IIII
step=15, rand=5, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII TTT. | IIII .... | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=16, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII .TT. | IIII .T.. | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=17, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII TTT. | IIII .T.. | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=18, rand=5, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T.. | IIII TT.. | IIII .T.. | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=19, rand=5, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..T. | IIII .TT. | IIII ..T. | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .T.I | IIII
step=20, rand=0, actions=<Drop> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII IIII | IIII .... | IIII ..TI | IIII .TTI | IIII .TTI | IIII
